SVGraphics

Class SVGraphics

  • java.lang.Object
    • SVGraphics.SVGraphics
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SVCustom, SVEllipse, SVRectangle, SVText

    public class SVGraphics
extends java.lang.Object
    SVGraphics class for building SVG elements

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SVGraphics()
      no-arg constructor returns a graphics element with location at (0,0), tag "svg", initialized attributes and transform maps.
